next_prompt.mission: Conduct comprehensive market research and opportunity identification for Microsoft Dynamics 365 manufacturing industry applications, focusing on unmet customer needs and potential ISV product opportunities worldwide
next_prompt.context: Dynamic 360 agentic journey system - scaffold enhancement phase completed excellently, now transitioning to market research phase
quality_requirements: ISV perspective for all opportunity assessments
Structured output following agent manifest schema
success_criteria: Comprehensive market analysis with quantitative data
Detailed competitive landscape map with gap analysis
Ranked list of top ISV opportunities with business case rationale
Technology integration roadmap aligned with D365 strategy
Actionable intelligence for ISV product development
safety_restrictions: No violation of Microsoft partner agreements
No compromise of D365 security or compliance
Maintain objectivity and avoid vendor bias
next_prompt.next_phase_integration: Outputs will feed PRD Agent, Technical Planning Agent, Market Research Agent, and Roadmap Agent
